name: CookiestClicker
description: Cookie clickers are Games where you can click a Cookie to gain Coins or any other in-Game Currency. In this Game, there is a big cookie and a Shop Icon next to it. When you click the Cookie you will get a Cookie$ (short: C$). These can be spent at the shop Icon. If you click the shop Icon and have the required C$ (isplayed above the shop icon), a clicker will fly out of the shop and to the Cookie. Asides from that, the amount of C$ displayed above the shop Icon at the time you clicked it will be subtracted from your current C$ count. This game doesn´t have any Goal other than to have fun and probably play it whilst doing something else. (there are no Saves ((((yet)))))
